enchantment.Gatherer.name: Gatherer
enchantment.Horticulturist.name: Horticulturist
enchantment.Palaeontologist.name: Palaeontologist
enchantment.Reaper.name: Reaper
enchantment.Gatherer.description: 50% chance to get 1 more fiber when cutting weeds, 50% chance to get 1 more hay when cutting grass, and 50% chance to get 1 more moss from trees.
enchantment.Horticulturist.description: Get 1 more flower (normal quality) when harvesting flower crops. No effect on forage seeds.
enchantment.Palaeontologist.description: 50% chance to get 1 bone fragment from cutting weeds or grass, and 5% to get 1 random fossil from cutting weeds or grass.
enchantment.Reaper.description: Increase damage and crit chance, monsters killed drop extra loot.
config.AvailableScytheEnchantments.name: Available Scythe Enchantments
config.AvailableScytheEnchantments.descr: Set which enchantments will be available through forging with a prismatic shard, no effect on existing enchantments.
